name: MeatMyBalls
description:
IMPORTANT: SOUND IS CURRENTLY BROKEN FOR WEBGL WE'RE TRYING TO FIND A FIX BUT FOR NOW TRY DOWNLOADING THE GAME

Credits

Birdcat Nate - Lead Programmer

Cristian Villaran - Programmer, Unity Developer, Animator

ADelightfulGoof - Character Artist, Environment Artist, and Animator

Thaira - Sound and Music Designer

Controls

    WASD / Arrow Keys - Move

    1 - Switch to Sword Mode

    2 - Switch to Gun Mode

    LMB - Swing Sword / Shoot Gun

   RMB -  Parry (to deflect projectiles); Hold to Block (to destroy projectiles)

    ESC - Exit Game

Tips  
  •  Gain life by killing enemies with your sword
  •  Spend life by shooting enemies with powerful bullets
  • Block with good timing to perform a perfect parry, gaining back a bit of health while also reflecting projectiles right back at your enemies
